N = int(input())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

L.sort(reverse=True)
# print(L)

if L[0] < sum(L[1:]):
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

n = int(input())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))
l.sort()

s = sum(l[:n-1])
if l[n-1] < s:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

n = int(input())
l = list(map(int,input().split()))

l.sort(reverse=True)

if l[0] < sum(l[1:]):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
L = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

if max(L) < sum(L) - max(L):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
